it.cnr.isti.thematrix.mapping.utils

Class QuerySet

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.thematrix.mapping.utils.QuerySet

  • public class QuerySet
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class for information about a batch of queries, used for the creation of a IAD file. No actions/changes are performed on the queries by this class. Note that: some details (e.g. database connection info) have to be explicitly retrieved from the various configuration singletons (this will be an issue in supporting multiple-DB interoperation).
